Key Match Events: The Mets stunned the Phillies in Game 1 with a 6-1 victory. In Game 2, the Phillies came back from a 3-0 deficit to win 7-6 with a walk-off single by Nick Castellanos.
Pre-Game Insights: The Mets and Phillies have similarities as both teams rallied in the second half of the season after slow starts.
Post-Match Reflections: J.T. Realmuto expressed respect for the Mets, stating they don't quit and do better off bullpen pitchers.
Others: The series is tied at 1 and will move to New York for Game 3.
